input_text:
Job Title: Maintenance Supervisor

Location: Mechanicsburg, PA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Job Summary

Company is in search of a Maintenance Supervisor within the Central PA area. This is an exciting opertutnity to join a dynamic team within an industry giant! Candidates that are interested should have 5 years of Maintenance Supervisory experience in an industrial manufacturing environment. Candidates will need a solid working knowledge of electricity/pneumatics, motor controls, and building maintenance. Experience with processing and packaging equipment and electronic control systems (Allen-Bradley) is highly preferred. If you are interested in joining this dynamic team please apply today!

location: Mechanicsburg, Pennsylvania

job type: Permanent

salary: $70,000 - 80,000 per year

work hours: 8am to 4pm

education: High School

Responsibilities

Provides leadership and direction of assigned maintenance technicians according to cost and quality standards in the department. Develop and implement training plans for technicians to enhance their skills Schedule and assign tasks and/or work orders Monitor and adjust staffing levels to ensure efficient support of plant operations Inspects jobs in process and at completion to ensure that standards of workmanship and safety are maintained. Posses a strong sense of urgency, and the ability to transmit that sense of urgency to the technicians in a constructive manner Recommends and plans equipment needs to improve production efficiency and/or achieve cost reduction Work closely with the production group to coordinate work. Continually look for avenues to improve communication between the production and maintenance groups Foster teamwork consistent with our company and plant Mission, Vision, and Core Values Coach and develop teammates, utilizing the performance management system. Adhere to all safety policies and procedures and promote all plant safety initiatives Follow all GMP's and work in a manner consistent with all corporate, regulatory, food safety, quality and sanitation requirements. The requirements herein are intended to describe the general nature and level of work performed by employee; but is not a complete list of responsibilities, duties and skills required. Other duties may be assigned as required

Qualifications

Experience level: ManagerMinimum 5 years of experienceEducation: High School

Skills

Maintenance

Equal Opportunity Employer: Race, Color, Religion, Sex, Sexual Orientation, Gender Identity, National Origin, Age, Genetic Information, Disability, Protected Veteran Status, or any other legally protected group status.

At Randstad, we welcome people of all abilities and want to ensure that our hiring and interview process meets the needs of all applicants. If you require a reasonable accommodation to make your application or interview experience a great one, please contact HRsupport@randstadusa.com.

Pay offered to a successful candidate will be based on several factors including the candidate's education, work experience, work location, specific job duties, certifications, etc. In addition, Randstad offers a comprehensive benefits package, including health, an incentive and recognition program, and 401K contribution (all benefits are based on eligibility).

Applications accepted on ongoing basis until filled.

Experience Level (if available): None
